_source.text: A block of XPS (extruded polystyrene) foam glued under the lid should work much better than bubble wrap or Thinsulate.

text: A block of XPS (extruded polystyrene) **foam** glued under the lid should work much **better** **than** **bubble** **wrap** or Thinsulate.

_source.text: A firm, closed-cell polyethylene foam is suitable for guns and other heavier custom-cut foam projects, since this foam can withstand oils and water much better than standard foam.

text: projects, since this **foam** can withstand oils and water much **better** **than** standard **foam**.
A firm, closed-cell **polyethylene** **foam** is suitable for guns and other heavier custom-cut **foam**
